title: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
OB: When using the 'Add Import' feature, if there is leading or trailing whitespace in the selected code, it is not being ignored and is included in the import statement.
EB: In my case, I made a selection by using 'Shift + Ctrl + Right' to highlight a block of code containing an import statement. However, when using the 'Add Import' function, instead of just 'Node', it inserted 'Node ' (with a space at the end) in the import statement.
SR: The 'Add Import' feature should ignore any leading or trailing whitespace in the selected code and only include the necessary code in the import statement.
